Name: Flower Power Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Dry Martini served super-wet with even more flower power than Austin Powers.
History: Created in 2007 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Flower Power Martini contains 176 calories
